You deserves happiness, not the pain

Ascent Physiotherapy is a full service physiotherapy clinic located in Comox, BC. We offer Physiotherapy, including Manual/Manipulative Therapy, IMS, Acupuncture, Radial Shockwave Therapy and exercise prescription including Personal Training to the residents of the Comox Valley and surrounding area.

Discover Relief

Why Choose Us

At Ascent Physiotherapy, we stand out as a premier destination for your physiotherapy needs in Comox, BC. Our commitment to your well-being goes beyond the ordinary, making us the preferred choice for residents in the Comox Valley and surrounding areas. Here's why you should choose us for your rehabilitation journey:

Expert Care

Our team of skilled physiotherapists brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to address a wide range of musculoskeletal issues.

Personalized Approach

We understand that each individual is unique. Our treatments are tailored to your specific needs and goals for a personalized healing experience.

State-of-the-Art Facilities

Equipped with the latest technology and modern facilities, we provide a comfortable and supportive environment for your rehabilitation journey

How We Work

Assessment

Our initial assessments are thorough, allowing us to understand your condition and create a personalized treatment plan.

Treatment

Using evidence-based techniques, we implement targeted treatments to address your unique needs and accelerate the healing process

Education

Empowering you with knowledge about your condition and self-care strategies is an integral part of our approach, ensuring long-term success.
